Body:
Description: Hello Team,

Our customer would like to customize the notifications that appear on the user side. I'm sharing an example in the attachment. They want to modify this warning according to their preferences.

We were able to make the necessary adjustments for CAP, so there’s no issue there. However, we couldn’t do the same for Device Control. How can we achieve this?

Best Regards.
What We've Learned Updated: Client would like to make custom notifications for the DC module.
Next Steps Updated: Will have to test on my side and get back to him.
